abstracts.abstract:
Existing law establishes the Prerelease Construction Trades Certificate Program in the Department of Corrections and Rehabilitation to increase employment opportunities in the construction trades for inmates upon release. Existing law requires the department to establish a joint advisory committee composed of, among others, representatives from building and construction trades employee organizations to implement the program, as specified.

This bill would make a technical, nonsubstantive change to that provision.

actions.description: Introduced. Read first time. To Com. on RLS. for assignment. To print.
From printer. May be acted upon on or after March 13.

extras.impact_clause: An act to amend Section 2716.5 of the Penal Code, relating to corrections.
